title: Predicting Student Progress in Learning Spaces: Wearable-Based Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and learning analytics concepts
context.additional_context: A process where students collect and analyze behavioral data in learning spaces using personal mobile devices, enhancing job competencies based on social studies content

learning_goals: Social and spatial behavioral data from learning spaces can be analyzed to build student-specific progress prediction models.
Learners acquire skills to collect and refine real-time behavioral data using wearable trackers and mobile apps.
Machine learning classifiers can be applied to identify low-progress students early and design personalized support strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
